column4: open terminal, navigate to where you extracted the kaid file and kaid.conf and run "sudo ./kaid"  (wiyhout the quotes ofcourse)
whats the cmd to navagate to the file i have the location copyed to clipbord
where did you extract the files to?
ok, open terminal and paste in this command to run the xkai server(without the quotes ofcourse)    "cd Desktop/kaid-7.0.0.7-linux-x86 && sudo ./kaid"
Killeroid KAID: Config file '/etc/kaid.conf' not found...
ok, try this "sudo mv kaid.conf /etc/ && sudo ./kaid"
mv: cannot stat `kaid.conf': No such file or directory
ok, try this "cd /home/nosa-j/Desktop/kaid-7.0.0.7-linux-x86 && sudo mv kaid.conf /etc/ && sudo ./kaid"
